Perceptor::

Perceptor opened his comm link and  spoke, this menssage would be 
heard to all menmbers of BlackFortress "To all member of Black 
Fortress" said the male "Go to area 5 of this place, in order to give 
yours duties... We have to go to a fight..."


The male saw to Blaze and told her "Blaze, we need your skills here.. 
Follow Blacknightmare and she tolde her where and with whom you will 
work. Cya ladies..."


The male left the place and Blacknightmare saw to Blaze and 
said "Ready to do yours duties?"
